A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It was AMAZING. A great tribute to the original movies. Lots of references to them. Its not the best Star Wars movie\, Empire Strikes Back takes that\, but I will rank it in my top 3. The only problem with the movies was the flow\, and the Finn and Rose arch. I have so much respect for Finn then Rose happens.


Ill give it a 8.5 or 9 / 10!!!
